C

checkSecurity(long, ConcurrentMap<Long, CustomerRecord>) - Static method in class suncertify.db.LockManager
Confirms that the security identification token passed for the operation on a particular customer record is the same as is attributed to that record in memory.

ClientFrame - Class in suncertify.presentation
Shows the database data in a graphical user interface, and has the functionality required by the requested use cases (search and book a client).
ClientFrame(String, DataMarker) - Constructor for class suncertify.presentation.ClientFrame
Creates the graphical user interface window that let users see the database data in a table, and has the widgets that allow the search and booking of clients.
conductQuery(String[]) - Method in class suncertify.presentation.ClientFrame
Conducts a query, whose string of characters typed by the user on the database field "name" graphical user input, and/or the database field "location" graphical user input is compared to the "name" and "location" fields of all the object-oriented customer records in the singleton cache, that are not deemed as deleted.
conductQuery(String[]) - Method in class suncertify.presentation.LocalClientFrame
Conducts a query, whose string of characters typed by the user on the database field "name" graphical user input, and/or the database field "location" graphical user input is compared to the "name" and "location" fields of all the object-oriented customer records in the singleton cache, that are not deemed as deleted.
conductQuery(String[]) - Method in class suncertify.presentation.RemoteClientFrame

LockManager - Class in suncertify.db
